2.qText: How to find missing number from array of n distinct numbers taken from 0,1,..n
2.qSolText: Choose all applicable options to solve this
2.ansCText: Logical AND all array values with indices to remain with answer
2.ansDText: Logical XOR all array values with indices to remain with answer
2.qSolFullText: Logical XOR all array values with indices to remain with answer since, a xor a = 0 and also a xor 0 = a
